content:
TITLE: Creating a Basic RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create a new RBush tree instance with default settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const tree = new RBush();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Searching for Items in an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to search for all items that intersect with a given bounding box, returning an array of matching data items.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const result = tree.search({
    minX: 40,
    minY: 20,
    maxX: 80,
    maxY: 70
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Bulk-Inserting Data into an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to efficiently insert multiple items at once using the bulk insertion method, which is significantly faster than inserting items one by one.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
tree.load([item1, item2, ...]);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Inserting an Item into an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create and insert a data item with bounding box coordinates and additional properties into an RBush tree.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const item = {
    minX: 20,
    minY: 40,
    maxX: 30,
    maxY: 50,
    foo: 'bar'
};
tree.insert(item);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing RBush as an ES Module
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import the RBush library as an ES module after installing it via NPM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import RBush from 'rbush';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking for Collisions in an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to efficiently check if there are any items intersecting with a given bounding box without retrieving them.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const result = tree.collides({minX: 40, minY: 20, maxX: 80, maxY: 70});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing RBush Data Format with Class Extension
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to extend the RBush class to customize the data format, allowing for different input structures like point arrays instead of objects with min/max properties.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
class MyRBush extends RBush {
    toBBox([x, y]) { return {minX: x, minY: y, maxX: x, maxY: y}; }
    compareMinX(a, b) { return a.x - b.x; }
    compareMinY(a, b) { return a.y - b.y; }
}
const tree = new MyRBush();
tree.insert([20, 50]); // accepts [x, y] points
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Removing an Item from an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to remove a previously inserted item from an RBush tree using reference equality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
tree.remove(item);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Exporting and Importing RBush Tree Data
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to export an RBush tree as JSON and how to recreate a tree from previously exported data, useful for server-client data sharing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// export data as JSON object
const treeData = tree.toJSON();

// import previously exported data
const tree = rbush(9).fromJSON(treeData);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Removing an Item with Custom Equality Function
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to remove an item using value comparison rather than reference equality by providing a custom equals function.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
tree.remove(itemCopy, (a, b) => {
    return a.id === b.id;
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an RBush Tree with Custom Node Size
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create an RBush tree with a custom maximum number of entries per node (16 instead of the default 9).
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const tree = new RBush(16);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving All Items from an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve all items stored in the RBush tree.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const allItems = tree.all();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Clearing All Items from an RBush Tree
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to remove all items from an RBush tree at once.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
tree.clear();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using RBush with ES Modules in Browser via CDN
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import and use RBush directly in the browser as an ES module using jsDelivr CDN.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script type="module">
    import RBush from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/rbush/+esm';
</script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using RBush with a Browser Bundle
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to include RBush in a browser using a traditional script tag, which exposes the RBush global variable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mourner/rbush/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/rbush"></script>
```
